events.message: The insured reported a rear-end collision involving their vehicle on a busy highway during rush hour.
The claim was reviewed and categorized under Auto Accident based on the reported keywords and incident description.
An insurance agent was assigned to handle the claim and began initial outreach to the customer.
The claim was officially acknowledged by the insurer with confirmation sent to the customer promptly.
Official request sent for the police report, photos of vehicle damage, and medical bills related to the accident.
The customer submitted all requested documents including accident photos and hospital reports within the deadline.
Investigation into the accident circumstances and liability began based on submitted evidence and statements.
Investigation completed confirming fault of the other driver, with no discrepancies found in the claim.
A settlement offer was proposed covering vehicle repairs and medical expenses as per policy terms.
The customer responded positively approving the proposed settlement amount and expressing satisfaction.
The claim was formally approved following customer acceptance of the settlement offer without further issues.
Payment was successfully issued to the insured's account to cover all approved damages and expenses.
The auto accident claim case was officially closed after full payment disbursal and confirmation from customer.
